name: RunTank RunTunk v2
description:
Multiplayer offline co-op game. Player will act as a tank to avoid enemy's shot and in a mission to collect spawned artifact.

Development Team :

1. Akmal Irfan Maulana - Game Designer

2. Winner Insanjaya - Lead Game Programmer 

3. Ilham Jalu Prakosa - Game Programmer 

4. Kristian Rolando Limantara - Game Programmer 

5. Kho Joane Vanesa Hadi - UI/UX Artist 

6. Adrian Muhammad Ronal - 2D Artist

7. Muhammad Abdul Aziz - 3D Artist
